comments:
Using the 7/22 I-build; executed an RoS for a dynamic web project that had not
yet been assigned to a server; the Run On Server dialog appeared and I selected
"Choose an existing Server" and hit next, however, the content of the wizard did
not change and this NPE was displayed in the error log:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 4 2005-07-25 12:46:15.484
!MESSAGE Unhandled event loop exception

!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 4 0 2005-07-25 12:46:15.484
!MESSAGE java.lang.NullPointerException
!STACK 0

Deferring to M8 with Rob's agreement. This is definitely something that needs to
be fixed, but it's not clear at this point if the workspace had gone bad or why
this code path was hit.

It's still not clear how this codepath was hit, and nobody else has reported
this problem. The error handling has been improved since 0.7, so I don't think
this is an issue anymore. Closing as 'works for me' unless you can still
reproduce this.
have not seen this since; just tried it again w/ RC4 and it works without error
